NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Product Categories and column Customer Segments is the flow between 592 and 2088? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Email Newsletter to node Books and from node Professionals to node Middle East, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Young Adults to node South America, from node Professionals to node Europe, and from node Young Adults to node Oceania, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Referral Program to target node South America? Please list all node labels along this path.
